executiveSummary: Chill Systems founders Chase and Brian pitched their portable beverage cooler, 'The Chiller', on Shark Tank, seeking $150,000 for 15% equity. Despite emphasizing sustainability and social impact, the Sharks criticized the productâ€™s practicality, pricing, and inconsistent messaging, resulting in no investment offers.

actionItems.task: Improve presentation delivery and focus on product features instead of overemphasizing social mission
Reduce production and retail costs to make the product more affordable

nextSteps: Founders to refine their product strategy, improve cost structure, and develop a clearer value proposition before pursuing future investors or markets.
